input.sentences: he had finally achieved his goal !
does n't he look so cute up there !
the dog and young ones were so excited !
there was much to celebrate this day !
things got livelier as the night went on .
output.sentences: He had worked very hard for this moment.
His parents were very proud of him and set up baby pictures of him at his graduation party.
They also got him a special cake to have at the party.
His uncles all showed up to support him also.
